Package gruppe.irc.messageListeners

This package contains the MessageListener interface that needs to be implemented by any listeners that is to be connected to the IRCConnection object.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageListener
    This interface must be implemented by all message listeners to be attached to an IRCConnection object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GlobalMessageListener
    A very crude message listener, it takes all messages it receives and prints out the prefix, actuall command and message to standard output in a tabulator separated format.
    PingListener
    This class is used to listen for PING messages from the server and reply to them.

Package gruppe.irc.messageListeners Description

This package contains the MessageListener interface that needs to be implemented by any listeners that is to be connected to the IRCConnection object. This package also contains some ready made listeners to illustrate the usage of the interface and how these listeners works together with the IRCConnection class to form the heart of a IRC client.
